title: Obtain the Sinner
text: Is it you who summoned me? When the Sun Crow rises, crops scorch, plants wither, and the great famine follows... Mortal, be prepared.

title: Raise to Phase 1
text: Thank you... even though I can't seem to recall anything.

title: Raise to Phase 3
text: The flaming feathers of the sunblaze shall shield the rivers for you.

title: Level Start
text: May there be no suffering beings wherever I go.

title: Win Battles
text: Did I also, in the past... incinerate them in the flames?

title: Lose Battles
text: Worry not... The Sun Crow doesn't feel pain.

title: Ultimate Skill
text: Solarfire!

title: Die in Battles
text: This is... the destiny of calamity...

title: Greeting
text: Is it the herald of sunrise? ...No, it's you calling for me.

title: Conversation 1
text: Legend has it that I popped out of a crack from the sun... Scary how words get around, I'm clearly a child of Mania... Ah, is it not appropriate to say that?

title: Conversation 2
text: Hunger, poverty, and slaughter... burn like an endless wildfire... It must be hard for you, to walk alongside calamity.

title: Conversation 3
text: Thank you for retrieving this body for me, and taking me to see this city untouched by disasters... The past me can finally rest when dusk comes.

title: Special Conversation 1
text: Slightly plump temple, and a hint of redness in between your brows. These signs... Fear not, it's a good omen.

title: Special Conversation 2
text: Fear and faith coexist, I had to become a presence to be feared... If I had the chance to go back in time... I would be sure to have a long, heart-to-heart talk with you.

title: Special Conversation 3
text: I was once worried that I couldn't protect all beings, and I was afraid that the devoured me would bring new disasters... Now everything is fine, fortunately, because of you.

title: Full Compliance
text: The next time ten suns appear in the sky, please promise me you will hold the bow. An arrow shot by someone of noble character, that's where I belong.

title: Idle
text: Crimson clouds and scorching heat... I fear a disaster has descended! ...Oh, it's just me.

title: Annoyed
text: The warmth of a human... If only I could touch you too.

title: Special Attention
text: It's you? ...It's rare to meet someone who has the courage to gaze directly at the sun.

title: Dispatch
text: A rare leisure stroll.

title: Dispatch Complete
text: Is this the treasure of this mortal world? I... I'm familiar with it...

title: Level Up
text: Illuminate... broader territories.

title: Join Team
text: Turn into ashes!

title: Head Pat
text: The glory of the sun cannot be obscured!
